name: SupportVanessaAndInnes
_source: speak;Vanessa;Prince Innes!|Yes, I’m fine.|I’m glad YOU are fine, sir.
speak;Innes;Good, Vanessa.|Your contributions to this war and also to Frelia as a whole have been very valuable.

speak;Vanessa;Thank you for your kind words, sir.|I was so worried when a messenger from Carcino told us you were in danger.|I worried for your safety.|Nothing is going to happen to me.|It’s still very strange to me that you are grown up and worry about me now.|When you first joined the knights, you were just a girl.
speak;Innes;You are a great knight now.|I’m counting on you, Vanessa.
speak;Vanessa;Yes.|I’ll protect you at any cost.
speak;Innes;Ha ha ha!|Vanessa, you don’t need to protect me.|It’s the other way around.|As the prince of Frelia, I have the duty to protect you.
speak;Vanessa;Oh, yes!|I didn’t mean to offend!
speak;Innes;Pshaw!|But remember, I am counting on you.
speak;Vanessa;Your skills are so polished now!|I bet you could shoot down a drop of rain!
speak;Innes;You flatter me, Vanessa, but my skills aren’t quite there yet.|But I’ve noticed that you have improved quite a bit since this war started.
speak;Innes;You make me confident in battle.
speak;Innes;Yes, you! With such a skilled knight at my side, I feel secure and can be my best in battle.
speak;Innes;I can always sense you trying to protect me at any cost.|Normally, I don’t need any help, but you are the exception.|I’m grateful for your help.
speak;Vanessa;Thank you very much!|It is my duty to protect you at any cost!
speak;Innes;Ha ha ha.|Your duty, huh.|That’s fine, Vanessa.|No need to worry about risking your life.|I’m pretty unstoppable with you beside me.
speak;Vanessa;You’ll have to use a spatula to peel me off your side!
speak;Vanessa;I’m sorry, Prince Innes!|Watching you shoot that arrow reminded me of something.

speak;Vanessa;The time you demonstrated your archery skills at the king’s birthday ceremony.|You shot three arrows simultaneously, and hit three different targets...|I was so impressed. I still remember that moment like it was yesterday.
speak;Innes;Well, even though there were three targets, they were only about an arm length apart.|It wasn’t like shooting three enemies in battle.|It’s only an exhibition trick.
speak;Vanessa;Even so, you couldn’t have done it without strong accuracy and concentration.|It made a very strong impression on me...|I’ve admired your skills ever since then.
speak;Innes;Vanessa...|Was it my skills you were admiring...|or was it me?
speak;Innes;Just kidding...|Kind of.|But I’m impressed you remembered it.|I had forgotten until just now.
speak;Vanessa;I have...always been watching you...|and always been admiring you...|I hope that doesn’t sound too creepy.

speak;Innes;I don’t know what to say...|I’ve always known you as a knight.|A great knight, in fact.|But when this war is over, I would like to get to know the other side of you.|The woman.|...Ahem.|Yes.|Let’s go, Vanessa.|Don’t ever leave my side from now on!
speak;Vanessa;Don’t worry, Prince Innes!|I would follow you anywhere!
